pain_points.headline: Most dealerships don't realize how much <highlight>revenue is being left behind</highlight> day-to-day.
pain_points.paragraph_1: As a GM, you know the numbers. But the daily reality is harder to track. While your team focuses on floor traffic, your CRM is becoming a graveyard of thousands of leads that will never be called again.
pain_points.paragraph_2: In Service, your advisors are overwhelmed. Every missed call is a missed RO; and for an average dealer, that's over $8,500 in lost revenue every single week.
pain_points.paragraph_3: You're fighting a losing battle against BDC turnover and lead response times that your competitors are already beating. It's not just "speed to lead": it's a total operational breakdown that costs you the unfair advantage you deserve.
pain_points.quote: "The cost of doing nothing is your highest expense."
pain_points.quote_detail: If your system isn't capturing every call, mining every CRM lead, and responding in seconds: you're paying for it every single day in lost units and service ROs.
pain_points.stat_2_detail: are missed or go to voicemail
pain_points.stat_4_detail: for new web leads on weekends
pain_points.stat_4_impact: Leads are sold by competitors in 5.

what_is_ai.headline: What is AI for Car Dealerships?
what_is_ai.paragraph_1: AI for car dealerships refers to artificial intelligence software designed specifically for automotive retail operations. Unlike generic chatbots or business automation tools, dealership AI understands automotive terminology, integrates with dealer management systems (DMS), and handles industry-specific workflows.
what_is_ai.paragraph_2: Key applications include Lead Reactivation to re-engage cold prospects, Speed-to-Lead Automation for instant responses (seconds, not hours), and Voice AI for handling phone calls and service appointments. Comprehensive platforms also centralize Reputation Management and convert web traffic into live SMS Engagement.
what_is_ai.paragraph_3: VisQuanta's AutoMaster Suite combines all five capabilities in one platform, purpose-built for how dealerships actually operate.

why_visquanta.headline: Bespoke automotive AI.
why_visquanta.intro: VisQuanta isn't here to replace your sales team. It's here to fill their pipeline with qualified, engaged buyers ready to make a decision.
why_visquanta.point_1_description: Our conversational AI is unlike any other tool on the market. It speaks automotive, understands buyer intent, and delivers qualified leads, not tire-kickers.
why_visquanta.point_2_description: We qualify leads and book appointments. Your salespeople do what they do best: turn opportunities we bring them into sold units.
why_visquanta.point_3_description: We're not a generic AI company that decided to try automotive. Every feature is purpose-built for how dealerships actually operate.

dealer_services.headline: Built for how <highlight>your dealership</highlight> sells cars.
dealer_services.intro: Every dealership operates differently. AutoMaster Suite adapts to your unique workflow: not the other way around.
dealer_services.independent_description: You built your dealership from the ground up. AutoMaster Suite gives you the same AI firepower as the big groups: without the overhead or complexity.
dealer_services.preowned_description: In pre-owned, speed is everything. Our AI engages buyers instantly, qualifies their needs, and gets them on your lot before the competition knows they exist.
dealer_services.franchise_description: Meet manufacturer response requirements effortlessly. AutoMaster integrates with certified systems and maintains brand standards across every touchpoint.
dealer_services.autogroups_description: Unified AI across all locations with centralized reporting and per-store customization. Scale your winning playbook instantly across your entire portfolio.
dealer_services.testimonial_placeholder: Canadian dealership success stories coming soon. Schedule your walkthrough to see how AutoMaster Suite can work for your store.

faq.headline: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.implementation_a: Most dealerships are fully operational within 14 days. Our white-glove onboarding includes CRM integration, custom scripting, and team training.
faq.compliance_q: Is the AI compliant with regulations?
faq.compliance_a: Yes. VisQuanta is fully compliant with CASL (Canada's Anti-Spam Legislation) and PIPEDA regulations, with monthly audits to ensure ongoing compliance.
faq.cancel_a: Yes. We offer flexible month-to-month agreements with no long-term contracts required.
faq.systems_q: Do I need to change my existing systems?
faq.systems_a: No. The AutoMaster Suite integrates seamlessly with all major DMS platforms, CRMs, and lead sources. We work alongside your existing tools, not against them.
faq.calls_q: What happens if I receive a call while the AI is responding?
faq.calls_a: Our intelligent routing system ensures live calls always take priority. The AI seamlessly hands off to your team when a customer is ready to talk, with full conversation context.
faq.customization_q: Is the AI customized for my dealership?
faq.customization_a: Absolutely. During onboarding, we train the AI on your inventory, pricing, processes, and brand voice. It learns your dealership's unique personality and selling style.
faq.roi_a: Dealers typically see 3-5x ROI within the first 90 days through recovered leads, faster response times, and increased service appointments. We provide transparent reporting so you can track every dollar.
faq.description: Everything you need to know about getting started with The AutoMaster Suite.
